I don't understand your question.

Then there's Decotype of course.

hhp

I assume he's asking about the meaning of this animated image.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416031622im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bowl2Fish_6055.jpg)
  
 - Herb

A bowl with 2 fish (symbolizing life) is the Herald of Hope + New Beginning to those who celebrate the first day of Spring (last day of Winter) as the beginning of a new year.

By typographically translating (Happy + Prosperous 1392) into the bowl-shaped letter Qaf and its 2 fish-like dots, MaryamSoft.com is encouraging Font Lovers to get Qalambartar before its price goes higher 2 weeks after 01.01.1392 (Wednesday March 20th).

Funny, at my house a bowl with two fish means two dead fish in two days. :-/

BTW the timing of your post with respect to Western astrology is interesting!

hhp

\> Funny, at my house a bowl with two fish means two dead fish in two days.

... and what does a bowl with a single fish means? Live single successfully?!  
 [http://www.7seen.com/seen1392/seen10-fish-1392.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416031622/http:/www.7seen.com/seen1392/seen10-fish-1392.php "http://www.7seen.com/seen1392/seen10-fish-1392.php")  
... and what does the aquarium of fish mean at a Japanese house? Hiroshima?!

A bowl with a single fish means one dead fish in two days. Keeping fish in a bowl is like keeping a human in a ziploc bag.

We actually kept a number of goldfish alive for 4-5 years (first in a backyard stream/bog system and then in an aquarium) but with all the elaborate equipment & materials and the constant monitoring I felt like a nurse at a retirement home.

hhp

\> We actually kept a number of goldfish alive for 4-5 years?!  
\> ... I felt like a nurse at a retirement home.

That's a lesson for All policy makers?! By the way:

Have you not regarded him who argued with Abraham about his Lord, because God had given him kingdom? When Abraham said, My Lord is He who gives life and brings death, he replied, I [too] give life and bring death. Abraham said, Indeed God brings the sun from the east; now you bring it from the west. Thereat the faithless one was dumbfounded. And God does not guide the wrongdoing lot.

You lost me.

If it matters: my favorite kind of fish is sushi.

hhp

O that kind of fish makes a man feeling like (a nurse at a retirement home) run as if he were a terrified zebra fleeing from a lion?!

When it's bad, and the lion is the opposite of a toilet, yes.

O that reminds of my prison mate when I was in Taping jail/Malaysia, spending my 6-month sentence for 7 years overstay. One day, thanks to the 7/24 free time there and then, he asked me, Aziz, what is the sweetest time in your life?  
...  
When my basket ran out of answers, he said, The time when it's bad and one discharges in time!  
Then, he asked me again, what is the hardest time in your life?  
...  
When my basket ran out of answers, he said: The time when it's bad, and a long-missed dear friend suddenly appears opposite of a toilet...  
-  
And I lost my toilet-minded mate twice as I have lost Hrant, admittedly, twice.
